item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://fabform.io/ - Form backend platform for smart developers. Free plan allows 250 form submissions per month. Friendly modern GUI. Integrates with Google Sheets, Airtable, Slack, Email and others.

item.title: Added Crucial Human Project
item.description: https://crucialhuman.com/products/project/ - Project](https://crucialhuman.com/products/project/) - Versatile project management platform. Free for up to 3 projects, unlimited users, 1 GB storage.

item.description:
https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/ - 1TB egress per month
https://aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/ - 10 custom metrics and 10 alarms
https://aws.amazon.com/codebuild/ - 100min of build time per month
https://aws.amazon.com/codecommit/ - 5 active users,50GB storage and 10000 request per month
https://aws.amazon.com/codepipeline/ - 1 active pipeline per month
https://aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/ - 25GB NoSQL DB
https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/) - 750 hours per month of t2.micro or t3.micro(12mo - 750 hours per month of t2.micro or t3.micro(12mo)
https://aws.amazon.com/ebs/) - 30GB per month of General Purpose (SSD) or Magnetic(12mo - 30GB per month of General Purpose (SSD) or Magnetic(12mo)
https://aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/) - 750 hours per month(12mo - Balancing](https://aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/) - 750 hours per month(12mo)
https://aws.amazon.com/glacier - 10GB long-term object storage
https://aws.amazon.com/lambda/ - 1 million requests per month
https://aws.amazon.com/sns/ - 1 million publishes per month
https://aws.amazon.com/ses/ - 62.000 messages per month
https://aws.amazon.com/sqs/ - 1 million messaging queue requests
https://azure.microsoft.com/services/virtual-machines/) - 1 B1S Linux VM, 1 B1S Windows VM (12mo - - 1 B1S Linux VM, 1 B1S Windows VM (12mo)
https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/bandwidth/) - 15GB Inbound(12mo - 15GB Inbound(12mo) & 5GB egress per month
https://azure.microsoft.com/services/storage/) - 5GB LRS File or Blob storage (12mo - 5GB LRS File or Blob storage (12mo)

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://spacelift.io/ - Management platform for Infrastructure as Code. Free plan features: IaC collaboration, Terraform module registry, ChatOps integration, Continuous resource compliance with Open Policy Agent, SSO with SAML 2.0 and access to public worker pools: up to 200 minutes/month

item.title: fix(index): use light theme as default fallback
Merge branch 'ripienaar:master' into master
item.description:
https://upstash.com/kafka - - Serverless Kafka Cloud offering with per-request-pricing. It has a free tier with max 10000 messages per day.
https://www.coupler.io/ - Data integration tool that syncs between apps. It can create live dashboards and reports, transform and manipulate values, collect and back up insights. The free plan has unlimited users, 100 runs with 1000 rows a month and unlimited integrations.
https://www.svgrepo.com/ - Explore, search and find the best fitting icons or vectors for your projects using wide variety vector library. Download free SVG Vectors for commercial use.
https://terminusdb.com/ - Managed free service for TerminusDB, a document and graph database written in Prolog and Rust. Free for dev, paid service for enterprise deployments and support.
https://www.dataimporter.io - Tool for connecting, cleaning, and importing data into Salesforce. Free Plan includes up to 20,000 records per month.
